Anggota BK DPRD dari PSI Yakin William Aditya Tidak Langgar Kode Etik
05 Nov 2019, 21:01 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) akan berusaha meyakinkan Badan Kehormatan (BK) DPRD DKI Jakarta mengenai kadernya William Aditya Sarana yang tidak melanggar kode etik. William Aditya disebut menjalankan fungsi pengawasan terhadap Pemprov DKI.
"Ya sudah (dijelaskan kepada BK), ini momentum buat DPRD DKI Jakarta bahwa dalam hubungan kemitraan dengan eksekutif kita tetap mengkritisi," kata anggota BK dari Fraksi PSI, August Hamonangan saat dihubungi, Selasa (5/11/2019).
August hadir saat rapat BK membahas pelaporan William. Dia menyebut apa yang dilakukan William menjadi salah satu cara agar DPRD dipercaya masyarakat.
"Kita tunjukkan kepada warga DKI bahwa dewan masih layak dipercaya," kata August.
PSI yakin William tidak langgar kode etik saat mengunggah anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82,8 miliar. William, dianggap August, malah memperkuat fungsi dewan.
"Tidak (melanggar), justru WAS(William Aditya Sarana) melakukan penguatan fungsi Dewan khususnya bidang pengawasan dan budgeting," kata August.
Sebelumnya, warga DKI bernama Sugiyanto melaporkan anggota DPRD William Aditya Sarana kepada BK DPRD DKI Jakarta. Dia dianggap melanggar kode etik karena mengunggah KUA PPAS yang masih rancangan.
Sementara itu, BK DPRD DKI Jakarta telah melakukan rapat pertama aduan pelanggaran kode etik untuk anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta dari Fraksi PSI William Aditya Sarana. William akan dipanggil untuk dimintai keterangan.
"Kita akan mengundang William untuk menjelaskan pada kami. Kemungkinan hari Senen (11/11)," kata Wakil Ketua Badan Kehormatan Oman Rohman Rakinda.
Anggota BK masih membahas soal sikap kritis yang diatur dalam kode etik.
"Belum sampai kesimpulan seperti itu. Tapi memang ada aturan etik ya ada hubungan kerja antara DPRD dengan eksekutif. Itu pertama kita diminta untuk kritis. Apa yang disampaikan oleh William itu bagus kritis, tapi berikutnya ada, kritis tapi harus adil, profesional dan proporsional nah ini akan kita dalami. Di internal kode etik kita (Keputusan DPRD DKI Jakarta nomor 34/2006) pasal 13 ayat 2," imbuh Oman.

DPRD BK Members from PSI Are Sure William Aditya Does Not Violate the Code of Ethics
05 Nov 2019, 21:01 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Indonesian Solidarity Party (PSI) will try to convince the Jakarta DPRD Honorary Board (BK) about its cadre William Aditya Sarana who does not violate the code of ethics. William Aditya is said to carry out the oversight function of the DKI Provincial Government.
"Yes, it has been (explained to BK), this is a momentum for the DKI Jakarta DPRD that in partnership relations with the executive we still criticize," said BK member from the PSI Faction, August Hamonangan when contacted on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
August was present at the BK meeting to discuss William's reporting. He said what William did was one way for the DPRD to be trusted by the public.
"We show the citizens of DKI that the council still deserves to be trusted," said August.
PSI believes William did not violate the code of ethics when uploading the Aibon glue budget of Rp.82.8 billion. William, considered August, actually strengthened the function of the council.
"It did not (violate), instead WAS (William Aditya Sarana) strengthened the function of the Board, especially in the field of supervision and budgeting," August said.
Previously, a DKI resident named Sugiyanto reported a DPRD member William Aditya Sarana to the DKI Jakarta DPRD BK. He is considered to have violated the code of ethics because he uploaded the draft KUA PPAS.
Meanwhile, the DKI Jakarta DPRD BK has held the first meeting on the violation of the code of ethics for members of the DKI Jakarta DPRD from the PSI Faction William Aditya Sarana. William will be called in for questioning.
"We will invite William to explain to us. Possibly Monday (11/11)," Oman Deputy Honorary Chair Rohman Rakinda said.
BK members still discuss the critical attitude set out in the code of ethics.
"Not yet to conclusions like that. But there are indeed rules of ethics yes there is a working relationship between the DPRD and the executive. First we are asked to be critical. What is delivered by William is critical, but next there is, critical but must be fair, professional and proportionate. "We will explore this. In our internal code of ethics (DKI Jakarta DPRD Decree number 34/2006) article 13 paragraph 2," Oman added.
